sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.UALicensingHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>UALicensingHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var UALicensingHelper = Class.create();
UALicensingHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getParentAppLicenseModel: function() {
		var gr = GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
		if (!gr.canRead()) {
			gs.logWarning("Security restricted: cannot read", "UALicensingHelper.getParentAppLicenseModel");
			return "";
		}
		gr.addQuery('name', this.getParameter('sysparm_table_name'));
		gr.query();
		if (!gr.next())
			return 'none';

		var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sys_package');
		if (!gr2.get(gr.getValue('sys_package')))
			return 'none';

		return gr2.getValue('license_model');
    },
	
	getLicenseModelByAppId: function() {
		
		var licModel = "none";
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_package");
		if (!gr.canRead()) {
			gs.logWarning("Security restricted: cannot read", "UALicensingHelper.getLicenseModelByAppId");
			return "";
		}
		gr.addQuery("source", this.getParameter("sysparm_app_id"));
		gr.query();
	
		if (gr.next())
			licModel = gr.getValue("license_model");
		
		return licModel;
	},
	
    type: 'UALicensingHelper'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-05-27 22:57:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7673299b53a31200f61dcbaac2dc340f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UALicensingHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Subscription Management and Enforcement Framework" source="com.glide.subscription_framework">3edd70cb6d2220100acb70b35343302a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7673299b53a31200f61dcbaac2dc340f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-10-26 19:18:03</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1062</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
